definitions: Removes obstructions or unwanted items from a place.
Passes over or through something without touching it.
Becomes free of clouds or mist.
Makes a net profit after expenses.
Resolves a person of suspicion or accusation.
examples: The janitor clears the tables after lunch.
The horse easily clears the high jump.
The project clears all regulatory hurdles.
The sky clears after the storm.
The business clears a good profit this quarter.
